column1: The seminar leader was well prepared
column2: The seminar leader gave interesting and informative classes
column3: The seminar leader explained the subject clearly
column4: The seminar leader was effective in leading the class or seminar
column5: The seminar leader is receptive to students' questions
column6: The seminar leader stimulates interest in the subject
column7: The seminar leader stimulates discussion on the subject
column8: The seminar leader stimulates me to think and learn

column11: What have been the positive features of this module up to this point?
column12: Were there any negative features of this module up to this point? What aspects of the module might be improved?
Could be more discussion in seminars.

column11: Interesting to think deeper about topics I've never considered.
The contrast it has compared to the biological sciences gives me a different view point in understanding

The readings have been very interesting - seminars are informative and increase my understanding of the difficult concepts - Hugo explains and summarises things clearly in a way that’s easy to understand

column13: I think Hugo goes through the discussion points as if we’ve completely understood the content but most of the time a few us don’t have a complete grasp on it- when we ask he explains them well but I think it would be helpful if he gave a brief overview of the reading and philosophical theories before we discussed.

column11: The seminar leader did a really great job and make me understand the topic a bit more than just by reading it myself.
column13: Great job, I really like the flow of the content and reading the articles, kinda of opens my mind to what other people might think
